wikipedia_page.main:
Mark Denham (born 1975) is a British actor, best known for his role as Joe Greyshott in the sitcom Second Thoughts. Denham later appeared in one episode of the show’s sequel, Faith in the Future. Denham had a role in the third episode of Killer Net and appeared in The Full Monteverdi. 
He was trained at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art, graduating in 1997.

response: *Joe (Mark Denham) - Faith's son. A regular character in Second Thoughts, he appears in just one episode of Faith in the Future, when he tells his mother he has important news for her. Faith suspects Joe is about to come out as gay; however, his news is actually that he has joined the Conservative Party - something that Faith, an ardent Labour supporter, is horrified by.
*Joe Greyshott (Mark Denham) – Faith's teenage son. Joe is obsessed with football and only shows interest in girls when they like football.
